Body:
centre = np.array([[0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0]])
dis, ind = gsp.shell_neighbors(centre, distance_lower_bound=self.
    lower_radii, distance_upper_bound=self.upper_radii, sorted=True)
dis, ind = dis[0], ind[0]
mask = (self.radius <= self.upper_radii * (1.0 + self.eps)) * (self.radius >=
    self.lower_radii * (1.0 - self.eps))
assert_equal(len(dis), len(ind))
assert_equal(len(dis), len(self.radius[mask]))
assert_almost_equal(dis, sorted(self.radius[mask]), decimal=14)
